title: betosworld
author: betosworld
content: As the title says, we are currently looking for mountains of obsolete ASICs/mining equipment. Looking for LARGE quantities 1000+.If you know of anyone who may fit the bill, please refer me to them. I'm looking for facilities that are currently unable get rid of their old mining equipment for one reason or another.We are located in the Houston, TX area.Thank you!

comments.author: SKIN999
comments.body: Hello, please pass the contact information, maybe we can talk, I have the goodsE-mail: lance@unistar.mobi

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: SKIN999 on November 24, 2022, 02:00:25 AMHello, please pass the contact information, maybe we can talk, I have the goodsE-mail: lance@unistar.mobiSame user diff thread, proof of goods??Also beware of off forum transactions this user is requesting, which will most likely result in your loss of funds.Buyer beware.

comments.author: betosworld
comments.body: I appreciate it. Unfortunately, I'm not new to the crypto space and know most of the scams all too well.Been keeping my eye on these Unistar guys. Doesn't seem like a scam, but seems like a company who genuinely uses a translator to commence all US based sales lol

comments.author: SKIN999
comments.body: It's real, I just sent you an email, along with today's quote, so you can take a look when you have time!

comments.author: betosworld
comments.body: Quote from: SKIN999 on December 03, 2022, 02:18:52 AMIt's real, I just sent you an email, along with today's quote, so you can take a look when you have time!Â  Actually, you did not. This is what you emailed me: Code:Hi RobertI am Lance, our company sells a lot of brand new miners, I see you are selling new miners on your website, if you can my friend, I would like to be your supplier, our price is very profitable for big customers like you, the profit is around $1000 per miner.That is the same thing you've been spamming on every post, and considering I'm not looking for working miners, you are just reaching to anyone with a WTB post.Thanks.

comments.author: SKIN999
comments.body: Friend, I sent two emails to you. It's my fault sorry.
